metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45198 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Pillow before 9.2.0 performs Improper Handling of Highly Compressed GIF Data (Data Amplification).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45198` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 9.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 9.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.2.0-1').
